mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finance_transaction(ref_type, ref_id, patient_id, admin_id, type, category, amount, description, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{refType}, #{refId}, #{patientId}, #{adminId}, #{type}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{description}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE finance_transaction SET amount = #{amount}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE tx_id = #{txId}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS name, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'INCOME' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS income, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'EXPENSE' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS expense, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM finance_transaction WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT status AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM finance_transaction WHERE status IN ('COMPLETED', 'PENDING', 'REFUNDED') GROUP BY status ORDER BY FIELD(status, 'COMPLETED', 'PENDING', 'REFUNDED')
